API_Description: Accesses the contents of any annotation that has a pop-up window. For sound and file attachment annotations, specifies the text to be displayed as a description. **Annotations** : All
Examples:
Example: Create a text annotation, with author and contents specified.

```
var annot = this.addAnnot({
    page: 0,
    type: "Text",
    point: [400,500],
    author: "A. C. Robat",
    contents: "Call Smith to get help on this paragraph.",
    noteIcon: "Help"
});
```

See also the Doc object addAnnot method.
